function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased connectivity and interaction in smart cities.","Impact":"Risk of widespread outbreak and rapid transmission of contagious diseases within smart cities and among their populations.","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced health monitoring and surveillance systems, strict hygiene protocols, and rapid response plans for disease outbreaks.","Technologies":"Advanced IoT sensors, AI-driven health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and telemedicine platforms.","People":"Populations residing in smart cities, urban communities, and city visitors.","Owner":"Government health agencies, city administrators, technology companies."}]}
